CIPHER.0.cipherString: Without a doubt, at the center of the New Testament there stands the Cross, which receives its interpretation from the Resurrection.
CIPHER.0.question: Solve this aristocrat.

CIPHER.1.cipherString: We live in an age of mediocrity.
